comments:
Build id: I20051115-0800

I am occasionally getting cheese in the editor after inserting code using
content assist and organize imports in this build.  For example, if I type a
class name, and then hit Ctrl+Shift+M to import it, I get some parts of the text
pushed down by a line while other parts stay put.  

I will attach a screen shot as an example. In the screen shot, there is an
invisible line about an inch from the left hand side - everything to the left of
the line is fine, and everything to the right of the line has been pushed down
so the two pieces don't line up.

Created an attachment (id=30074)
Screen shot of editor
I remember that sort of cheese from GTK but this is Windows.
Would you have a sequence of steps I can use to reproduce this problem ?

I just noticed I get this error in my log every time I get the problem:
